typeProperties.script:
parameters{
	blobPath as string,
	blobName as string,
	containerName as string
}
source(output(
		Region as string,
		Plant as string,
		AverageTemperature as string,
		AverageHumidity as string,
		TemperatureDescription as string,
		ProcessedTime as string,
		PlantType as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source1
